release_note: Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

New feature: A Recently Used button has been added to the bottom toolbar of the editor. After tap it you can view and open recently used documents. There is no need to switch to the Recently Used page in the main navigation. Bug fixes and improvements.

Improvement: The Library mode s editor information bar is changed to fully display the path of the category to which the document belongs. Improvement: Optimized the toolbar at the bottom and now it is more convenient to add Documents Categories Folders .
Bug fixes and improvements.

New feature: New Settings Editor Theme Prefer: there are three options: Automatically by System Prefer Light Theme Prefer Dark Theme . When you choose Automatically by System the theme will change according to the light and dark settings of the iOS iPadOS system. Improvement: Compatible with iOS iPadOS 17. Improvement: A Replace... button is added to the local image upload interface of the document. When tap the Replace... button the local image address in the original document will be replaced with the uploaded image address. Other bug fixes and improvements.
New feature: add 25 new themes including 8 light themes and 17 dark themes. Bug fixes and improvements.

Improvement: Improved LaTeX s syntax support support escape support GitHub s sqrt 3x 1 1 x 2 syntax. Improved: LaTeX settings added option: LaTeX enables physics package. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed: Generate Github Style TOC function is not working properly.

New feature: References backlinks between documents can be viewed in the outline view. If there are references in the document to other documents or referenced by other documents they will be listed in the outline view. Tap the i button on the toolbar to see the outline view. New feature: The reference syntax between documents adds support for locating the title in the document. in the editor please place the cursor in the title and then tap the ... button Copy Note Link to Generate citation syntax and paste it in other documents. The original syntax is: Test mweblib: 16292173056753 and the syntax to locate the title is: Test mweblib: 16292173056753 titile . Where title means title or text in the document . Tip: You can also long press the document list in the Library and select Copy Note Link . New feature: Added three options Autocorrect Smart Dash and Smart Quote in the settings you can choose to disable all of them individually in the app without modifying the system s keyboard settings. Improvement: When you double Tap on the text of the link in the editor there will be an Open menu item in the pop up menu and the link can be opened after Taping. In addition the Format item in the pop up menu adds Copy Note Link . Improvement: When exporting HTML when using the default theme the width of HTML content was changed from unlimited width to editor line width in preferences in iPad and limited to 760 in iPhone. Improvement: mermaid library upgraded to 10.2.3. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Improvement: Improved the user experience of using multiple windows in iPadOS. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Fixed: In the preview mode while editing the preview will flicker when editing a document. Changed: The shortcut for strikethrough is changed to: cmd shift e. Changed: The Markdown link generated when inserting an attachment is changed to add an extension and line break. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

New: Now you can pin the note in the Library to the top. In the list long press the note and select Pinned Note . Changed: In the previous version the app did not open any documents after it was launched but now it automatically opens the last opened document. Changed: When copying an image from macOS and pasting it to iPadOS iOS it was pasted as a tiff format before but now it is changed to a jpg png format. Fixed: The URL scheme mwebapp: p quicknote to open QuickNote is not work when the app is not launched. Fixed: Some bugs in editing custom themes. Updated mermaid library and mathjax library. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Fix the bug caused by the previous version: Select All Delete will crash.

The editor can now set multiple fonts. You can now set different fonts for headings main content and code blocks and you can also apply the font you set to the preview. How to use: Settings Page General Settings Fonts Add or Edit Multiple Fonts . Compatible with iOS 16. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

Added the Change Icon feature to the category of the Library mode. Please try long press the category and choose Change Icon to use this feature. In addition to automatically new note regularly Quick Notes also adds a Manually New Note option. After selecting Manually New Note you can click the button in the upper right corner of the editor to add a new note. The editor optimizes the operation of opening links: when the mouse pointer is moved over the link a button will be displayed beside the link. Click this button to open the link. Fixed an issue where some special documents could not be jumped when clicking the title in the outline view in preview only mode. The cmark gfm library is updated to 0.29.0.gfm.4. This library is used to parse markdown syntax highlighting and generate html. It is very important. If you find any problems feedback is welcome. Added: Added Automatic Equation Numbering option for LaTeX equations in Settings Automatic Equation Numbering . Improved: When importing a theme if an existing name is detected it will first ask whether to overwrite the theme with the same name. Other bug fixes and improvements.

The UI is changed back to the 4.2.6 version. The keyboard of iPadOS adds two buttons M and ... . Pressing the M button will display all Markdown buttons pressing the ... button is a switch to show hide the toolbar on the keyboard . Added Export as Textbundle... to the menu item of the share button and changed the original Share this document to Copy Markdown . The shortcut key for inserting a table has been changed from the invalid Ctrl Shift T to Command T . The shortcut key in the table editing is changed to the same as the macOS version of MWeb. Press and hold the Command key in the Insert Table window to view the shortcut keys. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Further optimize the UI and UX. The original Insert Image File... feature only supports inserting images. Now you can also insert files and the name is changed to Insert Image or File... Other bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

Add a Copy Note menu item to the long press menu of the document list of the Library In the external folder mode the image path setting adds support for the filename variable. Fixed an issue where the character is not rendered when using in inline math formulas. Other bug fixes and improvements.
In Recent and Favorites Group add the How to use MWeb button tap the button will open the MWeb usage documentation . Optimized support for touchpad.

The iCloud sync button of the document library adds a Problems with synchronization menu. After clicking you can choose to re download the contents of the document library on iCloud or re upload the current document library to iCloud . Fixed a bug where local images referenced in HTML syntax were not displayed in the preview. In the quick note settings of the settings page add the option of Whether to automatically insert date and time . Other bug fixes and improvements.

Sidebar long press menu add new item: Add to Favorites . Now you can add the Library tag to the Favorites. The editor supports drag and drop to insert images and files. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Outline view add Images Attachments section in Library s documents. Preferences added LaTeX math formulas not to use syntax option. Markdown keyboard added insert character button. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Table editing changed to use native technology previously used Web technology . The interface for switching themes has been changed to a more friendly way. Creating themes is also easier and MWeb will add more themes in the future. Now you can also customize the theme tap the ... button on the top right of the theme switching interface to customize it. Note: Modifying the preview style currently requires switching documents to see the results. Insert Links and Images syntax is changed to the way of using dialog boxes. Fixed the problem of too many Web Content processes. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Fixed the crash bug of Generate Github Style TOC . version 4.1.7 CloudKit synchronization optimization: If the modification time of the pushed document is older than the modification time of the current document it will give up updating the document. Editor improvements: In the previous version images were not displayed in the list. Now they are also displayed in the list but they still won t be displayed in the table. Want to customize the theme please wait for the next version. Other bug fixes and improvements. If you encounter problems during the upgrade process please check this link: https: www.mweb.im mweb4qa.html version 4.1.4 1. Let me talk about the main points of Library iCloud synchronization: In addition to setting Store in iCloud on iOS you must also click Store in iCloud button in Preferences Library on MWeb for macOS. By default iCloud synchronization is not turned on. 2. Library iCloud synchronization has been further optimized. If there are images in the document before version 4.1.3 that cannot be synchronized please open the document and manually click the sync button then the images will be resynchronized. If the images of version 4.1.4 fails to sync it will try again. MWeb 4 update New editor using Commonmark standard and supporting GFM. The documents Library supports CloudKit synchronization. UI adjustments.

Editor improvements: In the previous version images were not displayed in the list. Now they are also displayed in the list but they still won t be displayed in the table. Want to customize the theme please wait for the next version. Other bug fixes and improvements. version 4.1.5 Add option in Settings: Translate Newlines to br tags Bug fixes and improvements. If you encounter problems during the upgrade process please check this link: https: www.mweb.im mweb4qa.html version 4.1.4 1. Let me talk about the main points of Library iCloud synchronization: In addition to setting Store in iCloud on iOS you must also click Store in iCloud button in Preferences Library on MWeb for macOS. When quick note is stored in the Library now you can choose which category to save to in the settings page. The Export MWeb 3 Preview CSS button has been added at the bottom of the settings page. When you choose to store the Library in iCloud and edit the documents in the Library the ... button at the bottom of the editor will have a Document History... item. Tap it you can check the document history version. Bug fixes and stability improvements. MWeb 4 for iOS iPadOS New editor using Commonmark standard and supporting GFM. The documents Library supports CloudKit synchronization. UI adjustments. If you encounter problems during the upgrade process please check this link: https: www.mweb.im mweb4qa.html
New editor using Commonmark standard and supporting GFM. The documents Library supports CloudKit synchronization. UI adjustments. Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Support publishing to the Yuque team repository. Click Publish to team repository... on the publishing interface and then fill in the homepage URL of the team repository for configuration. The insert time button on the keyboard toolbar has been added to insert the current time of Quick Note Time Format . Other bug fixes and improvements.

The publishing service adds support for Yuque Enterprise Edition. When adding Yuque s publishing service select Yuque Enterprise Edition. When entering the file list long press the file or folder in the list to display the menu ContextMenu to add Move to.. Rename . mermaid library updated to the latest version. Other bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

iPadOS version now can set the width of the editor line small middle large . Fixed the case where the cursor jumps to another position when entering text when there are too many pictures in the editor.
Add .rst file extension in folder setting. Other bug fixes and stability improvements.

Add: Markdown keyboard add Insert Current Date button shortcut: CMD D CMD Shift D . Add: Support iOS 13 Context Menu. Fix issue that publish to ghost can t update. Update mermaid lib to 8.5.0. Other bug fixes and stability improvements.

Markdown keyboard add and buttons and Find and Replace CMD F button. You can found it in Markdown keyboard M button or Setting page Custom Markdown Keyboard... enable the Find and Replace. Add file extensions: .rmd .mkd .mkdn .mdtxt to folder setting. Other bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
External Mode the Media Folder Name now can use vars: year month day . Bug fixes and stability improvements.
iOS 13 Dark Mode. Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Images Upload Services add https: sm.ms and aliyun OSS. Performance improvements for Editor. Other bug fixes and stability improvements.
Quick fix dropbox sync bug. Version 3.1.3: Publishing to Ghost. Support Documents Library link like: mweblib: 15591372930229 Other bug fixes and stability improvements.
Publishing to Ghost. Support Documents Library link like: mweblib: 15591372930229 Other bug fixes and stability improvements.

Publish to Yuque.com now can upload images to yuque please re add the Yuque publishing services . Version 3.1.1: Add: Publishing Services add publish to yuque.com. Add: Images Upload Services add Tencent Cloud COS. Improvement: upload to qiniu support custom path you can use: year mon day random filename .suffix . Improvement: now you can tap the Editor s local image for zoom and share it. Fix: the app crashes when rename dropbox s file. Fix: unable to insert gif file from Photos app. Other bug fixes and stability improvements. Version 3.0.4: Add: Enable Autolink Enable Code Block Line Number Render img tag to figure. Fix: the Library categories sort not the same as the macOS version of MWeb. Fix: the order list number will auto fix when edit delete the order list. Because Google close the Picasa Web API so Google Photos image upload service are removed please check: https: developers.google.com picasa web . Bug fixes and stability improvements. Version 3.0.3: New: Now you can add the Working Copy or Files app s folder to MWeb. You can add in Cloud Documents New Folder the toolbar in bottom Add Third Party Folder . New: Publishing Services add publish to sspai Matrix. New: Export to add Share the Document that you can share by AirDrop. New: Tap sync to Dropbox button will show the sync detail. Dropbox sync now will sync the small size file after the big size file. Preview now can show MWeb for macOS graphics define like mermaid viz echarts plantuml sequence and flow chart. Export to HTML now will encode local image to base64 and export it. Fix the sort by file name issue. In the Setting page Enable code highlight and Enable sequence and flow chart are removed. These options change to alway Enable. Fix can t close Sidebar in iPad. Fix CMD R can t switch to Preview Editor mode. MWeb for iOS 3.0 New Interface. Quick Note. Add Url Schemes 1. New Library Document: mwebapp: p newlibdoc 2. Quick Note: mwebapp: p quicknote . Full Text Search. Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Fix take photo crash bug. Fix some dropbox sync bugs. Other bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements. Lock some features in free version.

Add publish to tumblr Fix imgur upload bug. Add iOS 11 Drag Drop support. now you can drag the image to the editor for insert. Add custom keyboard toolbar buttons and sort. Add utf16 encoding file support. For gitbook user now you can open file link in preview mode. Add in app open website url in preview mode. Other bugs fix.
fix 3d touch bug. fix dropbox syc bug. other bug fixes.

New icon! Thanks Red5Sign http: weibo.com u 6264169884 Producter: http: weibo.com 313612326 Add Dropbox sync support. Add move the documents. Add mweb solarized dark mweb solarized light mweb Tomorrow Blue mweb Tomorrow Preview theme. Change the Editor theme will change all style now. Add show local picture as thumbnail in Editor. Add url scheme and 3D touch. Url scheme: show Home: mwebapp: p home. Show Home list item title contain MWeb : mwebapp: p home name MWeb. Show Library: mwebapp: p lib. Show Library list item title contain Inbox : mwebapp: p lib name Inbox. Show Cloud Documents: mwebapp: p cloud. Show Local Documents: mwebapp: p local. Add delete custom preview style edit style tap bottom delete button . Add custom sort Favorites items tap Edit button on right top . Fix iPad SplitView empty bug. Add Special Thanks. Other bugs fix.

Add export to Markdown and HTML. Add auto upload inserted images to Images Upload Services. Please click i button in folder on the right to config. Add publish to wizNote wiz.cn . Add custom Preview Theme. Just click New Preview Theme button in Setting page and fill the name and CSS. Add fullscreen button for iPad add Preview shortcuts: CMD R. Add undo and redo button to keyboard toolbar. Other bug fixes and performance improvements.

Fix the In App Purchase didn t display in Settings page bug. Fix when the folder media save path is absolute can t display images in Preview. Fix iPad rename and delete the current opened document will crash bug. Fix Preview will empty when publish to Evernote in Preview Mode.
